propertyDescriptions.astroType: The nature or genre of the content of the files in the dataset.
propertyDescriptions.astroFacility: The observatory or facility where the data was obtained.
propertyDescriptions.astroInstrument: The instrument used to collect the data.
propertyDescriptions.astroObject: Astronomical Objects represented in the data (Given as SIMBAD recognizable names preferred).
propertyDescriptions.resolution:Spatial: The spatial (angular) resolution that is typical of the observations, in decimal degrees.
propertyDescriptions.resolution:Spectral: The spectral resolution that is typical of the observations, given as the ratio \u03bb/\u0394\u03bb.
propertyDescriptions.resolution:Temporal: The temporal resolution that is typical of the observations, given in seconds.
propertyDescriptions.coverage:Spectral:CentralWavelength: The central wavelength of the spectral bandpass, in meters.
propertyDescriptions.coverage:Spectral:Wavelength: The minimum and maximum wavelength of the spectral bandpass.
propertyDescriptions.coverage:Temporal: Time period covered by the data.
propertyDescriptions.coverage:Spatial: The sky coverage of the data object.
propertyDescriptions.coverage:Depth: The (typical) depth coverage, or sensitivity, of the data object in Jy.
propertyDescriptions.coverage:ObjectDensity: The (typical) density of objects, catalog entries, telescope pointings, etc., on the sky, in number per square degree.
propertyDescriptions.coverage:ObjectCount: The total number of objects, catalog entries, etc., in the data object.
propertyDescriptions.coverage:SkyFraction: The fraction of the sky represented in the observations, ranging from 0 to 1.
propertyDescriptions.redshiftType: RedshiftType string C "Redshift"; or "Optical" or "Radio" definitions of Doppler velocity used in the data object.
propertyDescriptions.resolution:Redshift: The resolution in redshift (unitless) or Doppler velocity (km/s) in the data object.
propertyDescriptions.coverage:RedshiftValue: The value of the redshift (unitless) or Doppler velocity (km/s in the data object.
